pages.title: Vampiric Witchcraft
pages.text: A Heretic is a Vampire who has **awakened their magical potential**, becoming a true Blood Mage.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: - Must be a **Vampire**. \n- Must consume a **Witchâ€™s Heart**. \n- Must absorb power from a **Dark Grimoire**.

pages.title: Powers of a Heretic
pages.text: A Heretic can **use magic** unlike normal Vampires, unlocking **Blood Siphon, Necrotic Shield, and Arcane Vampire** abilities.

pages.title: Weaknesses
pages.text: Heretics consume **Blood and Mana** to cast spells. Running out of either weakens them greatly.
